title: 1459 MacArthur Blvd. 2bed/1ba, Gourmet kitchen, Hardwood, Granite
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.
If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.
The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.
1459 MacArthur Blvd. 2bed/1ba, Gourmet kitchen, Hardwood, Granite, and private balcony! , $2,650.00
New Special Offer: $1000 Cash Bonus At Move In!
Total credit applied at Move in & Security Deposit fee waived!
Please contact leasing agent for more details.
For an Appointment to View, please contact: David mobile:
Cats Allowed (Extra deposit may be required), No Dogs
Granite countertops in kitchen and bathroom
Prewired for high speed internet access and cable
Some units come equipped with alarm system and intercom entry
Complex built to high sound insulation standards for comfortable condo living.
Minutes to Downtown Oakland, San Francisco, Walnut Creek, and San Leandro
Close to Glenview District shops and restaurants as well as Dimond District
On main bus lines with a trasnsit score of 56
Close by parks and schools include Central Reservoir Recreation Area and Coliseum College Prep At Havenscourt Middle School
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
